metadata.title: CVE-2016-9487 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: EpubCheck 4.0.1 does not properly restrict resolving external entities when parsing XML in EPUB files during validation. An attacker who supplies a specially crafted EPUB file may be able to exploit this behavior to read arbitrary files, or have the victim execute arbitrary requests on his behalf, abusing the victim's trust relationship with other entities.

criterions.comment: epubcheck package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.2-1').
